sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect, useRef} from "react"; import { useNavigate, Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from "axios"; import {useDispatch} from "react-redux"; import drinking from "../Data/recentdrinks.json"; import StarRating5 from "../StarRating/StarRating5"; import StarRating4 from "../StarRating/StarRating4"; import StarRating3 from "../StarRating/StarRating3"; const Profile = ({ name, email, address, dob, account, loadDrink, onRouteChange }) => { console.log(name); console.log(email); console.log(address); console.log(dob); console.log(account); const format = (input) => { var pattern = /(\d{4})-(\d{2})-(\d{2})/; if (!input || !input.match(pattern)) { return null; } return input.replace(pattern, '$2/$3/$1'); }; console.log(format(dob)); const navigate = useNavigate(); let [newProfile, setNewProfile] = useState({profile: 'New profile'}); const {userSearch} = useParams() const searchUrl = ""; const Searchforuser = useRef(); const searchuserbyname = async () => { const searchString = Searchforuser.current.value || userSearch ||"" const response = await axios.get(`${searchUrl}?s=${searchString}`) setNewProfile(response.data.profile) Searchforuser.current.value = searchString if(searchString == null){ navigate(`/profile`) }else { navigate(`/profile/${searchString}`) } } useEffect(() => { searchuserbyname() }, []) return (
{/*

Profile page

name : {name}

email : {email}

address : {address}

date of birth : {format(dob)}

account : {account}

*/} {/**/}
Edit Profile
{name}
{address}
{format(dob)} {email} {account}
  • {drinking[0].strDrink}
    Go somewhere
  • {drinking[1].strDrink}
    Go somewhere
  • {drinking[2].strDrink}
    Go somewhere
  • {drinking[3].strDrink}
    Go somewhere
  • {drinking[5].strDrink}
    Go somewhere
  • {drinking[6].strDrink}
    Go somewhere
  • {drinking[7].strDrink}
    Go somewhere
  • {drinking[8].strDrink}
    Go somewhere
); } export default Profile;
